revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Pyre |image = [[File:Mt. Pyre.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Pyre. |tokens = 28,000 |location = East of Route 122. }} '''Mt. Pyre''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 480,000 HP.

===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
